name: Lulu
title: the Fae Sorceress
lore: The yordle mage Lulu is known for conjuring dreamlike illusions and fanciful creatures as she roams Runeterra with her fairy companion Pix. Lulu shapes reality on a whim, warping the fabric of the world, and what she views as the constraints of this mundane, physical realm. While others might consider her magic at best unnatural, and at worst dangerous, she believes everyone could use a touch of enchantment.
blurb: The yordle mage Lulu is known for conjuring dreamlike illusions and fanciful creatures as she roams Runeterra with her fairy companion Pix. Lulu shapes reality on a whim, warping the fabric of the world, and what she views as the constraints of this...
allytips: Glitterlance can be fired at odd angles depending on where your cursor is - Moving your cursor closer to Pix and Lulu will change your area of effect size considerably.
Consider casting Help, Pix! on ranged attackers for the Pix boost and Wild Growth on Tanks or Fighters for the added initiation power.
enemytips: The shots from Lulu's faerie can be intercepted - hide behind your minions to avoid the additional Faerie attacks.
Lulu excels when opponents heavily commit. Don't give her this chance! Use heavy harass tactics instead to force Lulu and her partner out of lane.

riot_spells.name: Glitterlance
riot_spells.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e3 }} second(s).

An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of {{ f6 }} damage per cast.

riot_spells.name: Whimsy
riot_spells.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
riot_spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed and {{ e7 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}.

riot_spells.name: Help, Pix!
riot_spells.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
riot_spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e7 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants True Sight of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Wild Growth
riot_spells.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ buffduration }} seconds, her ally gains <healing>{{ totalbonushealth }} bonus health</healing> and slows nearby enemies by {{ slowpercent }}%.

riot_passive.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
riot_passive.description: Pix fires magical bolts of energy whenever the champion he's following attacks another enemy unit. These bolts are homing, but can be intercepted by other units.

i1.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
i1.blurb: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Lulu''' is assisted by ''Pix'', a faerie, who fires a barrage of 3 bolts to her target every time she uses a [[basic attack]] against an enemy, dealing {{pp|5 to 39}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} with each bolt for a total of {{pp|5*3 to 39*3}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} per basic attack. The bolts can be blocked by units in the way of '''Lulu's''' target.
i1.description2: Casting {{ai|Help, Pix!|Lulu}} on an ally champion transfers ''Pix's'' help to them for 6 seconds.
i1.notes:
* ''Pix's'' bolts do not fire alongside abilities that apply on-hit effects ({{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}, {{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Infinite Duress|Warwick}}, {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}}).
* Each of ''Pix's'' attacks consume a stack of {{ii|Spellthief's Edge|Tribute}}.
* ''Pix'' fires from his own location and not from the one the unit he's following is.
* ''Pix's'' damage is counted towards the champion he is currently helping.

q1.name: Glitterlance
q1.blurb: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lulu''' and {{ai|Pix, Faerie Companion|Lulu|Pix}} each fire a magic bolt towards the target point, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy they pass through, reduced to 70% against enemies thereafter, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80%, decaying over 2 seconds.
q1.leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 260}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
{{st|Reduced Damage|{{ap|80*0.7 to 260*0.7}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}}}
q1.description2: If an enemy is hit by both bolts, the second bolt will deal no damage if the first bolt dealt full damage to them, or 30% damage if the first bolt hit another unit before them. The second hit will refresh the {{tip|slow}}.
q1.notes:
* ''Pix'' fires his bolt from wherever he is when ''Lulu'' cast ''Glitterlance''.
** Depending on cursor position both bolts can either crossfire, fire in parallel, or in opposite directions.
* Multiple hits on the same target will refresh the slow.

w1.name: Whimsy
w1.blurb: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
w1.description: {{sbc|On Ally Cast:}} '''Lulu''' casts erratic magic upon an ally champion, giving them {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|30%|ms}} {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the next few seconds.
w1.description2: {{sbc|On Enemy Cast:}} '''Lulu''' launches a spell on the target enemy champion {{tip|polymorph|polymorphing}} them into a harmless critter, reducing their {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} by 60 for a short duration.
w1.notes:
* ''Whimsy'' can interrupt channeled abilities when used on enemy champions.
* ''Whimsy's'' movement speed reduction is not affected by Slow Resist.
* ''Whimsy's'' polymorph changes with ''Lulu's'' skin.
* ''Whimsy'' has no cast time. It can be cast while moving and will not interrupt previous commands.

e1.name: Help, Pix!
e1.blurb: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
e1.description: {{sbc|On Ally Cast:}} '''Lulu''' sends {{ai|Pix, Faerie Companion|Lulu|Pix}} to the target ally, {{tip|shielding}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds if they are a champion.
e1.description2: {{sbc|On Enemy Cast:}} '''Lulu''' sends {{ai|Pix, Faerie Companion|Lulu|Pix}} to the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and granting {{tip|true sight}} of them for 4 seconds.
e1.notes:
* ''Pix'' will return to ''Lulu'' if the one he's following exceeds his leash range (2000 units)
* ''Help, Pix!'' has no cast time. It can be cast while moving and will not interrupt previous commands.
* ''Pix'' will continue to assist the target ally for the full duration even if the shield breaks (the same applies for the shield if the target ally leaves ''Pix's'' leash range).
* ''Pix's'' {{ai|Glitterlance|Lulu}} bolt can be fired while he is away from ''Lulu'' from his location and towards the cursor (effectively extending {{ais|Glitterlance|Lulu}} range).
* Similar to spellshields, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|Riposte}} will block the damage but '''Pix''' will still follow.
* Apply {{tip|Single target}} effect to enemy target or {{tip|shield}} to ally target.

r1.name: Wild Growth
r1.blurb: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lulu''' enlarges the target allied champion, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} units around them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, increasing their {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}} and causing them to {{tip|slow}} nearby units for 7 seconds.
r1.notes:
* ''Wild Growth'' has no cast time. It can be cast while moving and will not interrupt previous commands.
* ''Wild Growth'' has a size limit ({{ci|Cho'Gath}} with 10 {{ai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} stacks will not grow significantly but will gain extended range on {{ai|Vorpal Spikes|Cho'Gath}}).
* ''Wild Growth's'' bonus health is not affected by {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} and its resulting health restoration will persist after the duration ends.
* ''Wild Growth's'' slow persists while enemy units remain in range and for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the marked area.
* ''Wild Growth's'' knock up will go through {{tip|untargetable}} effects.
** {{color|red|{{sbc|POSSIBLE BUG:}}}} {{ci|Fizz}} will also become targetable by everything other than [[Unit-targeted|on target]] effects.
